prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Vietnamese. 

Please PRESERVE ALL the original timestamps for EACH ENTRY.

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:01:01,826",
    "end": "00:01:03,626",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "is this correct?"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:01:06,066",
    "end": "00:01:06,806",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "Okay thank you!"
  }
]

ONLY and ALWAYS return a valid JSON back:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "vi": "Vietnamese text"
  }
]
```
